roleset.name: to tell funnies (jokes!)
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry joke.01, which maps to VN class 37.6. No FN for the noun.

example.name: All args
example.text: I also listened to his jokes with Kissinger about exporting 10 million female Chinese to the U.S., which stunned the U.S. Secretary of State.
example.arg: about exporting 10 million female Chinese to the U.S.
